com.lakemonsters2635.composites

Class HDrivePneumaticClosedLoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lakemonsters2635.composites.HDrive
      • com.lakemonsters2635.composites.HDrivePneumatic
        • com.lakemonsters2635.composites.HDrivePneumaticClosedLoop

  • public class HDrivePneumaticClosedLoop
extends HDrivePneumatic
    Uses PID to drive the main drive assembly when the middle wheel is down.
    Author:
    localuser

    • Field Summary

      void drive(double X, double Y, double rotation)
      Depresses the middle wheel when X goes above a certain tolerance.

        public edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDController pid

    • Constructor Detail

      • HDrivePneumaticClosedLoop

        public HDrivePneumaticClosedLoop(IDrive drive,
                         IActuator<java.lang.Double> middleWheel,
                         IActuator<java.lang.Boolean> piston,
                         ISensor<java.lang.Double> setPointGetter,
                         edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDController pid,
                         double depressionTolerance)
        Parameters:
        drive - Drive module.
        middleWheel - The turny part of the middle wheel.
        piston - The thing that pushes down the middle wheel.
        setPointGetter - Thing to get the set point. Value is sent to the PIDController. Sensor may be shared with the PIDController.
        pid - The PIDController. Is given a set point by the setPointGetter.
        depressionTolerance - Determines the value at which the middle wheel will be depressed.

    • Method Detail

      • drive

        public void drive(double X,
         double Y,
         double rotation)
        Depresses the middle wheel when X goes above a certain tolerance. When the middle wheel is depressed the drive is driven by pid rather than the IDrive implementation.
        Overrides:
        drive in class HDrivePneumatic
